entry.title: Multi Layered Pacchi Floral Necklace

22 carat gold bridal multi layered floral and peacock design uncut diamond pacchi necklace with south sea pearl strings and handcrafted peacock motifs on the sides. The necklace is teamed with matching peacock design jhumkas.
For inquiries contact: mail@totaramsons.com

entry.title: Mugdha Art Studio Designer Sashi Engagement
entry.content:
Fashion designer Sashi Vangapalli of Mugdha Art Studio got engaged to Sandeep. For her engagement event, Sashi adorned a beautiful rich diamond necklace set studded with rubies; diamond haram; small tikka and gold armlets. Sashi looked gorgeous!

Pic Courtesy: Ragalahari
